title: My account has been suspended for 3rd party software
body:
So I come home from school today, hoping to get closer to that gold 5, when suddenly I get a message. My account has been suspended for 3rf party software usage. This is utter bullsh*t. I don't use curse, I use skype. I don't use any custom skin software, plays.tv etc. 

To add onto that, 50% of the time ill be playing at a local internet cafe called Gamestorm. I've been using this place ever since I first made my LoL account, why now? What can I do to get my account un-suspended? Is there anything I can do? Or is it just..... Gone...

One of my very good friends just signed up, I was teaching him the game...

Edit: I spent $35 dollars on the game yesterday, proceeded to the internet cafe and played for around 5 hours.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Bans for use of disallowed third party software are usually pretty solid, however your best bet if you honestly believe you've done nothing wrong and that this was a false ban would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
